description.full:
ofHttpRequest is a class which acts as a data structure to store variables that are normally needed to do a HTTP request. It is used internally by ofURLFileLoader .

See also: ofHttpResponse

methods.name: getId
methods.short: \return the unique id for this request

methods.name: ofHttpRequest
methods.parameters: const string &url, const string &name, bool saveTo=false

#class ofHttpRequest

##InlineDescription

an HTTP GET or POST request

##Description

ofHttpRequest is a class which acts as a data structure to store variables that are normally needed to do a HTTP request. It is used internally by ofURLFileLoader .

See also: ofHttpResponse

##InlineDescription

##Description

ofHttpRequest is a class which acts as a data structure to store variables that are normally needed to do a HTTP request. It is used internally by ofURLFileLoader .

See also: ofHttpResponse
